title: Unfiltered: 24 Hours On A 4th Generation Dairy Farm

subtasks: Enter a vehicle
Operate vehicle to drive 15 minutes
Arrive at a lookout over the Murray River
Check wind conditions
Activate a drone if wind permits
Observe cows being brought in
Operate hydraulic lever for feeding cows
Assist in milking process
Handle fresh eggs, beef, and lamb patties
Prepare and cook meal with dairy farm products
entering and operating the vehicle, driving to the lookout (maybe to check wind conditions for drone?) so another task.
"Tour a dairy farm" with SUBTASKs: observe cows being brought in, operate hydraulic lever, assist in milking process, handle farm products, cook and consume meal.
Check weather before drone operation.
Enter vehicle
Drive for 15 minutes
Arrive at the lookout over the Murray River
Check wind conditions for drone use
Observe cows being brought in
Operate hydraulic lever (for feeding or something)
Assist in the milking process (implied)
Handle and eat farm products (eggs, meat)
进入车辆**
驾车行驶15分钟**

检查风向以决定是否放飞无人机**
观察奶牛被引导进入挤奶大棚**
操作液压装置为奶牛投食**
协助挤奶过程**
处理农场产品 (鸡蛋、牛肉、羊肉切肉)**
